code: export var fnGetTheme=function fnGetTheme(){var themeStorage=window.localStorage.getItem('themeStorage');var theme;var className;if(themeStorage){theme=JSON.parse(window.localStorage.getItem('themeStorage'));if(theme[1]){className='gray';}else if(theme[2]){className='pink';}else{className='skyblue';}document.body.setAttribute('class',className);}else{theme={'1':true,'2':false,'3':false};window.localStorage.setItem('themeStorage',JSON.stringify(theme));}return theme;};
